website_summaries.verdict: Taos Retro Stars are the shoes to wear when you just want to lie back and relax. These are so comfy you can wear them with or without socks and outside or at home. The suede uppers are buttery soft, while the ones in leather will loosen up sufficiently after a few wears for an even better fit. The footbeds contour to the shape of the feet and provide ample support for the arches. Soles offer good traction and resist slippage on slippery floors.
pros: Taos Retro Star footwear are so much better than slippers when it comes to pure comfort, many customers say
The shoes have a casual, sporty style that brings in tons of compliments, plenty of users have noted
A lot of testers love the exceptionally supportive footbeds of Taos Retro Star sneakers
A good number of people have mentioned liking these sneakers so much that they have bought three or more pairs in different colors
The quality of these kicks from the Taos brand is top-notch, according to several reports from consumers
Planning your ootd is easy with Taos Retro Star sneakers because they match well with almost any casual clothing
A couple of testers are pleased with the soles on these kicks, which they say is quite grippy
The shoes provide a good fit width-wise, some say
A few individuals have expressed delight over the many colorways available for the shoes
cons: Taos Retro Star shoes run small, several buyers have noted
The sneakers are kind of heavy, two people have observed
Some have noted that the leather variation of the shoes are a bit stiff at first and needs a few wears to loosen up

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable....but not of usual Taos quality
customer_reviews.text: ****Update: After less than a dozen wears, the rubber sole is peeling off from the front end of both shoes. Have never worn them in wet weather or even outside except to walk to and from the car. Feeling disappointed and kind of ripped off. Original review: So comfortable -I wish I could wear them every day. Found them true to size.
customer_reviews.author: jla22

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Show EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These Taos sneakers are the ultimate in comfort....I put them on right out of the box, then walked all over the city. They're so comfortable they feel like someone broke them in for me. They really support my feet....I can walk in them for hours. These come with two sets of shoelaces...black and white.....perfect! I have THREE pair of Taos Moc Star canvas sneakers....which fit exactly like these do and are just as comfortable, with excellent support. These leather ones are perfect for winter weather....I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderful! They’re super cute and super comfortable! I’ve gotten compliments on them when out. They really support your feet and keep you feeling good. I ordered my usual size and they fit great. They’ve held up for a couple months and look perfect. I did spray them with water repellent spray to protect them from wet oregon winters. I want more colors now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Best tennis shoes I have ever owned. I have to be careful what shoes I wear and typically cannot wear shoes like these because they don’t have arch support, but these have great arch support! I will continue to buy them. Have three pair now and love them. If you suffer from fallen arches this shoe is for you! Buy a half size larger than what you normal wear tho.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: Great style, snug, great for long walks
customer_reviews.text: They fit more snugly than I'd imagined, so I didn't add my usual orthotics for heel pain and arch support. Even without the additional stuff I usually add inside, they're my most comfortable shoes for walking a long time., by far. I was tired of sneakers that didn't provide good walking support. These work for me. I love the youthful style too, I don't feel like a granny in these.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cute kicks
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Taos shoes and I honestly don't own a lot of shoes. I travel a lot and walk quite a bit while out and about in other countries and they are my go to shoe. I have a leather pair, these black suede and a canvas and they all fit true to size. Well made, comfortable, nice subtle arch support and definitely more fashionable than your average 'tennis shoe'.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rich

customer_reviews.title: They are still a flat type of casual shoe but have a nice arch support and I really like the look of ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected. I originally ordered a 1/2 size up due to other reviews, but returned them for my regular size (7.5, not 8.). My foot is fairly wide and has a high arch. They are still a flat type of casual shoe but have a nice arch support and I really like the look of them! The return was quick and easy with a drop off to UPS.
customer_reviews.author: nthomasrn

customer_reviews.title: Unsanitary, shoes were used, but amazon delivered
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely disgusted by taos, the shoes arrived damaged with wear and tear and smell like feet. There are stress marks on the sides of the shoes and scuffs all around the toe box and heels. The shoelaces were dingy as well. I paid for new shoes and got this used pair instead. update: Sole provisions sent me a new pair of shoes after refunding the original pair. I love taos shoes and wore out my old pair after 4 years. I hope these last me just as long.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: These were cute and would have been comfortable except for my right foot hallux rigidus (arthritis in big toe joint). The material is leather and had no give making it painful but that’s just a personal problem. Left was fine. Good arch support and very cute. Runs a half to whole size short. I’m usually an 8 1/2 in athletics but it still felt a tad short in a 9. Could have went with a 9 1/2. Definitely order half size up for starters. Wanted for Zumba and had it not been for my one joint issue would have kept.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 7 but ordered a 7.5 and they fit perfect. I walked all over Disney Paris in them and I was wishing I had my broken in Nike’s. The socks I wore were too thick so I then took off the socks but the insides of the shoe doesn’t feel that great with bare feet. I bought a pair of Disney socks that were thinner and then the shoes felt better. But they are really cute and fine for when you aren’t getting twenty thousand steps. I also walked all over Paris one day wearing them and they were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Janice L

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy for me but so far stretching made a difference.  But I wear wide width which is the reaso
customer_reviews.text: So as much as i like these shoes. They are very uncomfortable for me. I wear a size 11w and ordered size 12 because wide witdth is not available. I've stretch them after trying them on the first time and noticing the discomfort instantaneously. So far the stretching has done some justice but still need more stretching. Overall I like the less bulky sneaker design. Not Comfortable for me but so far stretching has made a difference. But I wear wide width which is the reason for my discomfort
customer_reviews.author: Kay-Regular shopper at Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Wow, sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are incredible. I normally wear a 7 in dress shoes and I get a 7 1/2 in boots to wear with heavy socks. I got a 7 1/2 and they are perfect. I have a narrow foot with a high arch and these have an incredible arch support system. I am amazed. In addition, I thought they were canvas , but they are leather and this is a plus. The laces are long enough to tie easily. They are cut lowish around the ankle and heel area, which works well for my feet. On top of all of these great features they are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Brice

customer_reviews.title: Not really available in wide width, do t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Not actually a wide width, the option for wide is a lie. The shoe was listed as option for regular or wide width. I knew how narrow this brand runs so I specifically ordered wide width. I had never seen these shoes in a wide width before so I was pleased to find them. I recieved normal, non wide shoes. Since they are leather instead of fabric they have less give than the canvas ones I already had so they fit very snug, the side of my foot hangs over and rubs in the toe box. If they truly had wide width would not have this issue
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Go a half size up
customer_reviews.text: Due to the high arch insole, I should have gone with a half size up, as many reviews suggest. I did try swapping insoles, and it made the shoes fit better (less tight) but the shoe itself is designed for the in sole that comes with it. With the smaller insole the heel rubs. So I can wear them, and they are moderately comfortable, but not for long periods of time. I bought them for work. There is no way I can be on my feet for 8 hrs a day in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is super comfortable. I have a neuroma on my left foot and need shoes with metatarsal support. These offer that and are cute and stylish. Would like to get them in other colors. My heals do lift out of the back some so I tied the laces so that it tightens in the heal. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: lemontarte

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so far! I enjoy the bounce when I walk, and so far I've worn them two days with lots of walking and my feet weren't sore. The arch support is fantastic! Update: I wore these to the zoo for a daytrip >12,000 steps and my feet weren't sore at all! Then I tried them out on a daytrip walking around Boston with >19,000 steps and yet again, my feet weren't sore! AMAZING SHOES!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hope

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit and very stiff.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is exactly what I wanted. Beautifully made and leather top will make it easier to keep clean as opposed to canvas. The fit for this shoe was off for me. I am typically a medium in any shoe. This shoe, though it had a wide toe box, was tight and the heel was slipping off my foot. It was also way too short. The shoe itself was extremely stiff. Maybe they soften with wear. Planning on trying a size up to see if maybe the proportions will make for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: N Davis

customer_reviews.title: Super cute shoe just too loose on ankle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 8 wide. It fit well in the toe box and i would even go to say a little too wide but they were comfy. Downside for me was that the arch was great but the leather around the ankle was too shallow so my heel slide up and down due to not sitting quite deep enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya3bbmom

customer_reviews.title: Narrow feet--don't size up
customer_reviews.text: I love the arch support of these shoes! My previous pair had to be used as work shoes so I ordered these as a replacement. My other one's are Star so when I ordered these I only had some idea of what to expect. Some reviews said to size up and some said that the arch support was not as good of quality as the Star. However, I have found that the arch support is just as phenomenal. In regards to the sizing up issue, that may be the case for some, but DO NOT SIZE UP IF YOU HAVE NARROW FEET.
customer_reviews.author: bluegoblin999

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the hype, I have a narrow foot and ordered half size larger, fit well with a thin sock and perfect with a normal sock, I could probably wear an 8 in canvas only barefoot or thin sock. LOVED the arch support!! Will order more!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable if they fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my regular size 81/2 and had to send back and order a size 9. The nine was perfect in length, but the heel was too wide. ( I might add that my foot is difficult to fit.) I ordered these because this brand usually fits my foot like a glove! They are great if you need a shoe that fits a high instep. Comfortable shoes crafted with soft, though sturdy material. I will try to get an insert for the heel. If this doesn't work, will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes however they run a little big. I ordered an 8.5 but wish I had returned them for an 8. They still work for me though. I'm glad to have them. I like the decorative zigzag stitching and the low soles.
customer_reviews.author: MissCate

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers and this is my third pair in different colors. You need to buy 1/2 size up and they are perfect with great support. I can walk for miles in these!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Squared

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Taos and I love the fit (order 1/2 size larger than normal). I did send this pair back because of the two different shades of blue. Will reorder this shoe in solid blue. It is a great shoe just not my style.
customer_reviews.author: lovetokayak

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and well made. However, they hurt across the top of my toes so I had to return them. I have difficult feet and most people probably won’t have the same problem with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Selby

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these shoes! Fit perfectly in length and width. Very sleek and easy to clean and super comfortable! Have yet to really test them out on longer periods of walking but should they prove uncomfortable, I will update my review. Overall, I am very pleased and glad I chose these over Keds!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Elizabeth Peavy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very sure shoes! I watched for these shoes to go on sale because I didn’t want to pay $100 for them. I purchased them and love them. I am able to wear them all day to work. I purchased another pair of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Umas7

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for support
customer_reviews.text: Wore these to Disneyland brand new. They didn’t require a break in period. I walked ten miles a day and stood in long lines and my feet never hurt. These are great supportive sneakers and don’t look like old lady shoes at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ian and Trish

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size up as suggested but they are so loose. The sole is comfortable with the bridge support but the leather feel so hard and not comfortable to walk. I got the white one and not sure if it's leather. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: B lover

customer_reviews.title: Feeling let down
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other Taos products that fit great but these were tight and short on my foot. I sent them back and may order a longer length. I even ordered a 9.5 which is on the upper end of my size. The sole detail was a thinner band than I expected but I would have kept them if they had fit otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: --KM

customer_reviews.title: Order .5 size up
customer_reviews.text: I needed some all-white shoes and these work. I wear a size 10 shoe and these shoes feel comfortable with a thin footie sock. If wearing a regular athletic sock, plan to order up a half size.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5 which seems to be almost non existent. The shoes I got fit perfectly. I'm very happy with them. The only thing I would have preferred is that they be cotton fabric instead of the hard "plastic like" material on the outside. But that being said, they are great. Wore them for hours as soon as I tried them on and love them. Would definitely buy Taos again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Retro Star The right stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to wear these black cool looking sneakers. They fit much better the the Freedom sneakers I have. Those are not that comfortable. Hope these are great for walking around.
customer_reviews.author: reddance

customer_reviews.title: If you like Adidas, this is also for you
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. The color is lighter than the image. I am upset the the look was not what I expected. I loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: MCG

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support, Little stiff the 1st wear but I expect them to loosen up. Super cute and comfortable. I did go up a 1/2 size from my normal size. Little loose but better than too tight. I bought leather one but hubby didn't like them so I switched to the canvas. Much better look for me.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a high arch
customer_reviews.text: I love these tennis shoes. I have chronic plantar fasciitis, due to very high arches. These shoes allow me to walk all day without pain during, & after wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow across the arch
customer_reviews.text: These are way too narrow across the top of the foot for a regular person's foot. I should have listened to other reviews. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love this sneakers. They have much more support than others. Still have to add the clear arch supports, no big deal, tho! They are very comfy. I think I have every color!
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker fits very well & has ample support. Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & stylish sneaker. I had shopped all summer trying to find the perfect black sneaker. Checked out many brands & styles. This one works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: EasyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe. Arch support way too high
customer_reviews.text: The arch support is way too high for all. I had to add a heel support to wear the shoe. I tried putting other supports in and they did not fit well.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Dunno
customer_reviews.text: Did not last, purchased for girlfriend and 3 months later they have worn out fast. Inside back towards heal material is gone. Not a lot of use either? Walking shoes for a few vacations.. not like daily use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shoes that go with everything. My size is a 9.5. I ordered a 10. They just fit with thin socks. There is no more room. So if you want a looser fit, you might want to go up a full size. They have great support.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a birthday present for my mom in the retro star white leather. However, I just opened the box and realized I received the guest star in white canvas instead. I'm extremely disappointed as I ordered these early because of the great price and now I'm stuck with the wrong shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sampai98

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have the canvas version. The leather is just as great! No break in time for me.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for casual wear with jeans and leggings. The leather is soft and I like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made shoe. Little stiff until I break them in but great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! I didn’t order up a half size like some reviews stated—glad I did not. I love the casual look.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort but leather is peeling after 45 days!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to receive my black leather retro star sneakers. Wore them on a 10 day trip to Europe. They were comfortable and have a great arch support. But, after only having them for around 45 days, the back of the shoe is beginning to peel. I own about 6 pairs of Taos shoes and love every pair. This is the first time I was disappointed in the quality of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Samboiler

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: They are very good looking shoes. Great support. A touch small in length.
customer_reviews.author: EcoGirl

customer_reviews.title: There are a couple parts that rub
customer_reviews.text: I’ll need to break them in a bit, but they do have more support than converse all stars.
customer_reviews.author: Skredberry

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and on my feet all day. This is the best shoe I’ve ever purchased for support and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McRae

customer_reviews.title: Quality seemed great but fit very tight
customer_reviews.text: Quality seemed great but fit very tight. I am always a solid 8 and the shoes even with laces loosened were snug.
customer_reviews.author: PPS

customer_reviews.title: Love my shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, they arrived on time and are comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D. Hepp

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. First time buyer. Great quality. Classic style.
customer_reviews.author: TxCollect

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs a little big
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, I need to get a 1/2 size smaller- Runs just a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes but didn’t work for me. I ordered a half size larger as I read the reviews and it’s suggested by many. I wear 8, purchased 8.5 and they were to long. My heel was slipping out as I attempted to walk. I will try size 8 next
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes for comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: so cute and unbelievably comfortable! These are better than my adidas for long days on my feet. excellent for travel.
customer_reviews.author: amanda henderson

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes August 2019. It is now March 2020 and they are coming apart. I only wear these maybe once a week. The glued on rubber sole is separating.
customer_reviews.author: BEVERLY STARNES

customer_reviews.title: Cute and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Added some waterproofing and I wear these all the time! Theyve become my new go-to sneaker for running errands.
customer_reviews.author: Lab0508

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing shoe. So many shoes in this style are flat with zero arch support. Not these! They are insanely comfy! Loveeeee
customer_reviews.author: ks44

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size, just like all the other reviews state.
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable shoes. Just right for a job that has me on my feet on hard cement floors all day.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Go up 1/2 size!
customer_reviews.text: My feet started to hurt much less after the first day of a 6 hour shift on concrete floors! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Ehrhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these but they were very narrow. I actually wear narrow shoes and these were too tight for me. Also had scrunched up toes. They were very cute though
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Buy a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were a bit tight when I first got them, even after going a 1/2 size up. Now they are perfect. I can wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna M. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for - a fresh white sneaker in leather. I would say true to size, my usual size is 39.5 EU and I ordered the 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leather tears easily
customer_reviews.text: Leather toe scuffs and tore easily. I have a canvas pair that wear much better. They are so comfy and cute just wish they held up better. Won’t be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: Need size 8, not the 1/2 larger as suggested. Will send back.
customer_reviews.author: LorTol

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed about these. Love the look of them but they are super uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Comfy Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and these are incredibly comfortable shoes. I'm going to purchase another pair in green.
customer_reviews.author: KOrmesher

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart with 10 days tough use
customer_reviews.text: Product fell apart after 10 days of walking. Glue separated sole from shoe.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for walking all day. This is my 4rth pair of Taos tennis shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a Trimalleolar fracture to my ankle recently and this shoe has been perfect once I could wear shoes. It’s cut down low enough on the sides to not rub my ankle bone incision. Great arch support. I can loosen up the shoe strings to fit my brace. I do have to order a full size bigger than my regular size in this brand. (Not due to the brace they just run short) I normally wear a 9 but a 10 in this shoe fits perfectly. I previously ordered the white canvas as well! The black leather will be perfect for cooler weather or rainy weather since my shoe choices are very limited for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Moye

product_meta.title: Taos womens Retro Star
product_meta.description: Let this star shine. Retro Star is a different look with a suede or leather material, providing great arch and metatarsal support. The lacing delivers a custom fit while a line of design adds character to the outsole. Perfect comfort comes from the Curves & Pods premium removable footbed, one which will never let you down.
